properties.areaDesc: Northern Lea County; Guadalupe Mountains Above 7000 Feet; Eddy County Plains; Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains; Central Lea County; Guadalupe Mountains of Eddy County
properties.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 11 at 4:07AM CST until February 12 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Midland/Odessa TX
properties.description:
...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON
THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING FOR THE GUADALUPE AND DELAWARE MOUNTAINS,
MUCH OF THE SOUTHEAST NEW MEXICO PLAINS...

* WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, mixed precipitation
expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice
accumulations of less than one tenth of an inch. For the Winter
Storm Watch, heavy mixed precipitation possible. Total snow
accumulations of 1 to 4 inches and ice accumulations of a light
glaze possible.

* WHERE...Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains and southeast New
Mexico Plains.

* WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 2 PM MST this
afternoon. For the Winter Storm Watch, from 2 PM MST this
afternoon through Wednesday morning.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

In New Mexico, the latest road conditions can be obtained by
calling 800-432-4269. In Texas, the latest road conditions can be
obtained by calling 800-452-9292.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON FOR THE GUADALUPE AND DELAWARE MOUNTAINS AND THE SOUTHEAST NEW MEXICO PLAINS
